scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace landing regBuild" "yarn workspace software-eng regBuild" "yarn workspace interests regBuild" && yarn workspace @nathanld/host regBuild
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn build-l" "yarn serve-l" "yarn build-se" "yarn serve-se" "yarn build-i" "yarn serve-i" "yarn dev-h" --names "landing,software-eng,interests,host" --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors blue,green,yellow,red
